description: Best friends Jax Maxim and Colby Tucker have shared a secret since before they each met their wives.  The guys are finding it's getting harder and harder to share that secret as married life cuts into their annual man-cations. Jax Maxim and Colby Tucker are resourceful men, they know how to make it work they just couldn't imagine not having each other's hard cocks anymore. Watch them engage in pure passion. This is infidelity at its finest! Lust cannot keep these two lovers apart!
title: Best Friend's Secret, Scene #01
